overview: Paris’s integrated transport system, run by RATP, is the envy of cities throughout the world. It consists of buses, trams, regional express railways and of course the famous Paris Metro. Over a dozen lines criss-cross the capital of France and arguably the most interesting are lines 5 and 6.
tagline: A Driver’s eye view of lines 5 and 6 of the Paris Metro
title: Metro (Paris)
